mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into sec_battery_single_charge
id,
operator_id,
station_id,
equipment_id,
connector_id,
bms_code,
bms_ver,
esti_r,
remain_capacity,
charge_time,
sOH,
soc,
voltage_h,
voltage_l,
tatal_voltage_h,
total_current_h,
tempture_h,
tempture_l,
before_soc,
after_soc,
start_time,
end_time,
rec_time,
in_time,
code,
msg,

#{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select:
SELECT bms_code, operator_id, station_id, equipment_id, connector_id, start_time, end_time FROM sec_battery_single_charge
AND DATE_FORMAT(end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H') >= DATE_FORMAT( #{param.startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H' ) AND DATE_FORMAT(end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H') < DATE_FORMAT( #{param.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H' )
AND DATE_FORMAT(end_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT( #{param.startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AND DATE_FORMAT(end_time, '%Y-%m-%d') < DATE_FORMAT( #{param.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d' )
AND DATE_FORMAT(end_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT( #{param.startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AND DATE_FORMAT(end_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT( #{param.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d' )
AND DATE_FORMAT(end_time, '%Y%m') >= DATE_FORMAT( #{param.startTime}, '%Y%m' ) AND DATE_FORMAT(end_time, '%Y%m') < DATE_FORMAT( #{param.endTime}, '%Y%m' )
AND DATE_FORMAT(end_time, '%Y-%m') >= DATE_FORMAT( #{param.startTime}, '%Y-%m' ) AND DATE_FORMAT(end_time, '%Y-%m') <= DATE_FORMAT( #{param.endTime}, '%Y-%m' )
AND bms_code = #{param.bMSCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND operator_id = #{param.operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND connector_id = #{param.connectorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT bms_code, voltage_h, voltage_l, before_soc, after_soc, soc, tempture_h, tempture_l, sOH, esti_r, remain_capacity, start_time, end_time FROM sec_battery_single_charge WHERE start_time= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AND end_time= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AND bms_code = #{param.bMSCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND operator_id = #{param.operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND connector_id = #{param.connectorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
